message: Hello @115712, I sincerely apologize for the frustrating experience you've had with our customer service and the delay in response. Would you be available for a brief phone call in the next hour? This will allow me to understand the issue fully and find a solution for you right away. INFPs value authentic connection and empathy, which can be better conveyed through a phone call than text. The message acknowledges their frustration, offers a personal touch, and proposes a direct solution. Escalating to a phone call demonstrates a commitment to resolving the issue and respects their need for a supportive and understanding interaction. The send time is within 1-2 hours due to the escalated nature and negative sentiment.
